description:
The school`s annual Okinawa training camp has begun! The students of Fleurir let loose a bit in the head teacher`s absence. Okinawa means beaches! Swimsuits! Beach volleyball! Ryou, Mitsuki, Gilbert, and Yoshinosuke normally show off their confectionery techniques at school, but Sayuri sees a new side of them as she watches them playing hard on the beach in swimsuits.
Source: crunchyroll
